subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the oldest university in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में सबसे पूर्वागोष के इस्तामानी विश्वविद्यालय का नाम क्या है?
explanation_en:
The University of Rajasthan, also known as Rajasthan Vishwavidyalaya, is the oldest institute in the state. It was established in 1947.
English: The oldest university in Rajasthan is the University of Rajasthan, famous by the name Rajasthan Vishwavidyalaya. It was founded in 1947.
